## Extension.inputRules() method

Register input rules which are activated if the regex matches as a user is typing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
inputRules?(params: ExtensionManagerTypeParams<GType>): InputRule[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>ExtensionManagerTypeParams&lt;GType&gt;</code> | schema params with type included |

<b>Returns:</b>

`InputRule[]`
